content:
That's fantastic to hear! It's great that you're already seeing the benefits of your training in your daily work.

Continuing to practice through online resources is a great idea. There are so many valuable resources available online, and you can tailor your learning to your specific needs and schedule. You can also use online resources to focus on specific areas of improvement, such as body language, tone, or storytelling.

Seeking out more in-person training in the future is also a great idea. In-person training can provide valuable opportunities for feedback, networking, and practice in a live setting. You can also learn from others, get feedback on your progress, and build relationships with like-minded individuals.

It's wonderful that you're already seeing a positive impact in your meetings at work. Being able to articulate your ideas clearly and engage with your colleagues more effectively can make a huge difference in your professional life. You're likely to see more opportunities open up for you as a result of your improved communication skills.

How do you plan to build on your momentum and continue to improve your public speaking skills over time? Are there any specific goals or milestones you're working towards?

Also, have you considered finding a speaking buddy or accountability partner to practice with regularly? This can be a great way to stay motivated, get feedback, and continue to improve your skills.
